page - Variable in class storage.TestQuestion
 
PASSWORD_HASH_ITERATION_COUNT - Static variable in class security.SecurityParameters
Specifies the number of iterations that the password hashing algorithm should run for.
PASSWORD_HASH_LENGTH_BYTES - Static variable in class security.SecurityParameters
Specifies the length in bytes of the password hashes that will be generated to securely store users' passwords.
PASSWORD_SALT_LENGTH_BYTES - Static variable in class security.SecurityParameters
Specifies the length in bytes of the password salts that will be generated to securely store users' passwords.
PasswordSecurity - Class in security
Class for securely verifying and hashing passwords.
PasswordSecurity() - Constructor for class security.PasswordSecurity
 
pdfRendererCache - Static variable in class controllers.RenderQuestionController
pdfRendererCache is used to share PDFRenderer objects between multiple controllers and request handlers.
pdfRendererCache - Static variable in class controllers.RenderTestController
pdfRendererCache is used to share PDFRenderer objects between multiple controllers and request handlers.
persistentStorage - Static variable in class controllers.Controller
This PersistentStorage object is shared with all other controllers and used to permanently store data.
PersistentStorage - Class in storage
Abstract class that represents the "persistent layer" of the application, storing everything (tests, users, answers, etc.) that must be permanently saved.
PersistentStorage() - Constructor for class storage.PersistentStorage
Create a new PersistentStorage, initializing whatever storage method backs the application.
